quotes.quote:
Emancipate yourselves from mental slavery. 
None but ourselves can free our minds.
quotes.author: -Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
quotes.author: -Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
quotes.author: -Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Every child is an artist.  The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
quotes.author: -Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
quotes.author: -Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: We become what we think about.
quotes.author: -Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Life is what happens to you while you’re busy making other plans.
quotes.author: -John Lennon

quotes.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have.  Do what you can.
quotes.author: -Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
quotes.author: -Plato

quotes.quote: Teach thy tongue to say, 'I do not know,' and thous shalt progress.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.quote: Everything has beauty, but nor everyone can see.
quotes.author: -Confucius

quotes.quote: It’s just pathetic to give up on something before you even give it a shot.
quotes.author: -Reiko Mikami (Another)

quotes.quote: If nobody cares to accept you and wants you in this world, accept yourself and you will see that you don’t need them and their selfish ideas.
quotes.author: -Alibaba Saluja (Magi)

quotes.quote: Life is not a game of luck. If you wanna win, work hard.
quotes.author: -Sora (No Game No Life)

quotes.quote: Sometimes I do feel like I’m a failure. Like there’s no hope for me. But even so, I’m not gonna give up. Ever!
quotes.author: Izuku Midoriya (My Hero Academia)
